name: The New Inn St Andrews

reviews.text: I stayed at the "The New Inn" with 2 of my friends last week on our first trip to St Andrews and it's a very nice place to stay :). The staff was very friendly and attentive and the rooms were wonderfull. We eated there for dinner and the next day for breakfast and the 2 meals were excellent. We were to early for check in and so our rooms weren't ready but we could let our baggage at the hotel. I forgott my glasses in the room and only saw it when I was bac in luxembourg. I sent them an e-mail and god a response very quickly.
reviews.title: great hotel and very friendly people

reviews.text: I can just recommend this hotel :))
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have recently stayed at the The New Inn on our first trip to St Andrews for a family wedding and can honestly say it is a joyful place to stay.
reviews.title: You'll like it.....but not a lot!!!!!

reviews.text: On arrival at the Inn the staff were wonderfully attentive and friendly and we were in fact early for check in and the rooms were not quite ready. This was dealt with in a speedy and professional manner and they proceeded to get the rooms ready as quickly as they could and let us check in early. This was much appreciated as one of our party was over 80 years old and was travel weary!
reviews.title: Do not eat here

reviews.text: The rooms are bright and spacious and have all the facilities you should need. WE had three rooms in total for our party and none of them was a disappointment.
reviews.title: would stay here again.

reviews.text: stayed here for the golf ,accomandation above pub very quiet and good quality rooms,5mins from the centre easy acsess to the golf courses through the town cheap taxi fare for the night life, warm welcome from the bar staff and locals.
reviews.title: great value ,great welcome ,very freindly locals,great bar staff

reviews.text: Free parking, great location, great value for money, extremely friendly staff, great room, very comfortable! Don't be put off by the fact that this is pub accommodation. It was very quiet downstairs. We booked a twin room and it was great value and really comfortable. It's a short walk to the centre and is perfect for exploring St.Andrews. You won't be disappointed!
reviews.title: Perfect for parent and teenager

reviews.text: I stayed here with my son in October (I've only recently joined tripadvisor). The owners - being aware that we were a mother and son away for a weekend together gave us the perfect roomaccomodation - a suite at the top of the inn.
reviews.title: Comfortable and welcoming

reviews.text: The two rooms were recently decorated and beautifully clean.
reviews.title: dirty and terrible
Too noisy
reviews.text: We stayed for one night recently. Our room was adequate and clean. The staff were excellent, nothing was too much trouble. Unfortunately we had a herd of elephants above us and that combined with the noise from the road meant no sleep.
My son and I stayed at The New Inn while he was on a conference trip to Scotland area.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: We found the room to be clean and really comfortable. We had wonderful full breakfast and really enjoyed the pub food also. The owner was very nice, friendly, helpful.
reviews.title: golf trip

reviews.text: We stayed here and found it within walking distance of the St. Andrews University,the Ruins of St. Andrews Castle and The Cathedral. We really enjoyed our time in St. Andrews. We would highly recommend a stay at The New Inn and a visit of St. Andrews.
reviews.title: A Perfect Weekend

reviews.text: We were from Vancouver, BC, Canada and really enjoyed our Scotland trip.
reviews.title: Fine traditional pub food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here in a bright and spotlessly clean, spacious room. The weather was very hot and we were glad that the window opened. Although the New Inn is right on the street, it was quiet at night. The bacon and egg we had for breakfast were perfectly cooked. We could have done with a selection of juices at breakfast, but orange juice was quickly brought from the bar when we asked. The New Inn is just a stroll from the beach and easy walking distance from the town centre. The staff were helpful and friendly. Parking wasn't a problem, although we weren't always able to park immediately outside.
reviews.title: Bright room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my boyfriend stayed here on Saturday night. We'd decided to go to St Andrews for the weekend and struggled to find anywhere to stay, luckily we found The New Inn. It was £90 for a twin room which we wouldn't have normally paid for 1 night but we didn't have an alternative.
reviews.title: Small, cosy and ideally located!!

reviews.text: Our room was clean and average sized. The bathroom door was a bit of a pain though, it had to be banged closed and was rather noisy! Tea/coffee facilities in the room as well as Sky TV, much to my boyfriend's delight! Big wardrobe too and comfy beds!!
reviews.title: Ideal base for a short stay.

reviews.text: Breakfast was included in the price so we had cereal, then toast and then a lovely cooked breakfast in the downstairs bar. Breakfast is served between 9-11am on a Sunday which is a reasonable time and we had to check out by 12. The bar also serves meals which we actually wish we'd had the night before instead of going to a restaurant which wasn't great!!
reviews.title: great budget hotel in St Andrews

aka: The New Inn St Andrews Hotel
description: The New Inn is a lively local with five contemporary en-suite bedrooms. All rooms have free wifi access, refreshment tray and free view TV. We offer a good selection of home made meals using local produce. A warm welcome is guaranteed at this ideal affordable base for exploring St Andrews. Walking distance to town centre and centrally located for many golf courses.
